title: Client dc's, doesn't reconnect.
body:
First it wouldn't reconnect although I had internet (it got stuck on 'attempting to reconnect'). Then I closed it, and opened it again. Black screen. Then "Failed to authenticate". Restarted my computer, took me a couple tries to log in. Bigger black screen. I alt tab, it says there's a problem with my internet. I hit retry. This happens three more times, then it puts me to the post game screen, with my team having remade, with me as the leaver.

My internet works fine. It worked an hour ago, it works now, it'll work when I play another game. So, tell me, what in hell just happened?

replies.body: It sounds like for some reason your network is having a hard time talking with the game server specifically. Sometimes your network can be in tip top shape but still have troubles communicating with specific servers for one reason or another. Check out the steps in this [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can get you back on the Rift!
